Package main

Class GameEnvironment

java.lang.Object
main.GameEnvironment
public class GameEnvironment
extends java.lang.Object
The GameEnvironment of our Farm Simulator. It holds all of the logic necessary to play the game.
Version:
1.0, May 2020.
Author:
Alina Phang, Jesper Slager

    • getTotalExpenditure

      public static int getTotalExpenditure()
      Returns:
      The total amount of money spent, used for calculating profit upon completion of the game

    • getCurrentDay

      public static int getCurrentDay()
      Returns:
      The day the game is currently on

      public static int getGameDuration()
      Returns:
      The chosen duration of the game

    • getFinalScore

      public static int getFinalScore​(Farmer farmer, double gameDuration)
      Calculates the final score based on number and status of crops, animals, items and the farm's money
      Parameters:
      farmer - The current farmer
      gameDuration - The chosen duration of the game
      Returns:
      The player's final score

    • finishGame

      public static java.lang.String finishGame​(Farmer farmer)
      Displays the farm’s name, the game’s duration, the profit made in this time, and a final score
      Parameters:
      farmer - The current farmer
      Returns:
      A message telling the player their final score

      Notifies the player that they are out of actions for the day
      Parameters:
      farmer - The current farmer
      Returns:
      A message telling the player to move on to the next day

    • createFarmer

      public static Farmer createFarmer​(int chosenGameDuration, java.lang.String farmerName, int farmerAge, java.lang.String farmString, java.lang.String farmName)
      Takes input from the UI, constructs the appropriate type of farm and returns a Farmer
      Parameters:
      chosenGameDuration - The duration of the game
      farmerName - The name of the farmer
      farmerAge - The age of the farmer
      farmString - The type of farm
      farmName - The name of the farm
      Returns:
      The farmer the player has made

      Checks if the farmer can afford a CropItem, then adds it to cropItems
      Parameters:
      farmer - The current farmer
      c - The CropItem to be bought
      Returns:
      A message telling the player whether the purchase was successful and their new balance

      public static java.lang.String moveDayForward​(Farmer farmer)
      Gives the farmer their daily cash bonus, deducts happiness from animals and checks if the game is finished
      Parameters:
      farmer - The current farmer
      Returns:
      A message saying if the game has finished, or the current day and daily bonus received otherwise

      Parameters:
      farmer - The current farmer
      c - The crop receiving water
      Returns:
      A message telling the player the crop's new time till harvest and how long it has been growing

      Parameters:

      cropToHarvest - The crop to be harvested
      Returns:
      A message telling the player how much they earned from harvesting the crop

    • tendToLand

      public static java.lang.String tendToLand​(Farmer farmer, java.util.ArrayList<Animal> animals)
      Increases the maximum number of crops that can be grown on the farm and gives all animals a small happiness bonus
      Parameters:
      farmer - The current farmer
      animals - The list of animals on the farm
      Returns:
      A message telling the player what they have received for tending to the land

    • brokenFence

      public static java.lang.String brokenFence​(Farmer farmer, java.util.ArrayList<Animal> animals)
      The player loses one or more of their animals and the remaining animals lose a substantial amount of happiness
      Parameters:
      farmer - The current farmer
      animals - The list of animals on the farm
      Returns:
      A message telling the player how many animals were lost

    • drought

      public static java.lang.String drought​(Farmer farmer, java.util.ArrayList<Crop> crops)
      The player loses half of their growing crops, the exact crops are determined randomly
      Parameters:
      farmer - The current farmer
      crops - The list of crops growing on the farm
      Returns:
      A message telling the player how many crops were lost

    • countyFair

      public static java.lang.String countyFair​(Farmer farmer, java.util.ArrayList<Crop> crops, java.util.ArrayList<Animal> animals)
      The player earns a cash prize, scaled to the number of crops and animals on the farm
      Parameters:
      farmer - The current farmer
      crops - The list of crops growing on the farm
      animals - The list of animals on the farm
      Returns:
      A message telling the player how much they earned

    • randomNumberInRange

      public static int randomNumberInRange​(int min, int max)
      Returns a random int in a given range
      Parameters:
      min - The minimum int (inclusive)
      max - The maximum int (exclusive)
      Returns:
      A random int

      public static java.lang.String generateRandomEvent​(Farmer farmer)
      Generates a random double and calls a random event if it is within a certain range
      Parameters:
      farmer - The current farmer
      Returns:
      The message passed from the specific random event method
